publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Milbourn, and are to be sold at his house in Jewen-Street,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Tis not Saint George we sing of here,".
A ballad in praise of General Monck.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "xber 28"; "16" has been written in before the imprint date.
Reproduction of the originals in the British Library.
